item.name: POST Add instance with multipart data

exec: pm.test("Platform - Storage - Instance - Add Instance with multipart data - Status - 200", function () {

body.raw:
--abcdefg
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="instance"

{
    "instanceOwnerLookup": { "OrganisationNumber": "910026755"},
    "labels" : [ "gr", "x2" ],
    "appId" : "{{appId}}",
    "dueDateTime": "2019-06-01T12:00:00Z",
    "visibleDateTime": "2019-05-20T00:00:00Z",
    "presentationField": { "nb": "Arbeidsmelding" }
}
--abcdefg
Content-Type: application/xml
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="default"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<Skjema xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                <Skattyterinfor-grp-5801 gruppeid="5801">                               
                               <klagefrist-grp-5804 gruppeid="5804">
                                               <KlageGjeldendeInntektsar-datadef-25455 orid="25455">2010</KlageGjeldendeInntektsar-datadef-25455>
                                               <KlagemeldingSendtInnenKlagefrist-datadef-25454 orid="25454" xsi:nil="true" />
                                               <KlageUtloptKlagefristBegrunnelse-datadef-25456 orid="25456">123$</KlageUtloptKlagefristBegrunnelse-datadef-25456>
                               </klagefrist-grp-5804>
                </Skattyterinfor-grp-5801>
                <klage-grp-5805 gruppeid="5805">
                               <spesifisering-grp-5836 gruppeid="5836">
                                               <KlageSpesifisering-datadef-25457 orid="25457">Orker ikke.</KlageSpesifisering-datadef-25457>
                               </spesifisering-grp-5836>
                </klage-grp-5805>
</Skjema>
--abcdefg--
